hero.content: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience building robust, scalable, and user-friendly web applications. With a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science Engineering, I specialize in the SERN stack (SQL, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) and complementary tools such as SQL, TypeScript, GraphQL, MongoDB, Material-UI, Tailwind CSS, and Bootstrap. My goal is to leverage technology to solve problems, deliver high-quality solutions, and create exceptional user experiences that drive business growth.

about.title: About Me
about.text: I'm a Full Stack Developer with over 3 years of experience building efficient, user-focused applications. I hold a degree in Computer Science Engineering from CUTonalá, where I discovered my passion for software development. Since then, I’ve specialized in designing smart solutions, solving problems through code, and delivering production-ready features using modern tools like React, Node.js, and SQL. I enjoy collaborating in team environments and take pride in creating scalable, high-quality applications. Beyond tech, I’m into video games 🎮, metal music 🤘 (I also play electric guitar 🎸), and reading. I’m constantly learning—often through platforms like Udemy—to stay up to date with the latest in web development.

description: Successfully transitioned from trainee to full-time developer after quickly mastering the tech stack and delivering high-quality results and production ready features.
Built and maintained a statewide academic management platform serving tens of thousands of students and staff
Improved app stability and maintainability by refactoring legacy frontend and backend codebase
Created dynamic front-end interfaces using React.js, Bootstrap, Material UI, and custom CSS to improve user experience.
Developed and integrated RESTful APIs with Node.js, Express, and Sequelize, ensuring reliable data access and performance.
Automated recurring system processes through cron jobs, improving performance and reducing manual workloads for staff.
Deployed and maintained updates on Linux (Ubuntu) servers via CLI, ensuring platform uptime.
Actively collaborated with cross-functional teams to meet project goals and improve platform functionality for both students and academic staff.
Provided technical support and training to non-technical stakeholders
Collaborated with the development team to improve internal tools and streamline platform workflows.
Built user interface components using React.js, Material UI, and Bootstrap, focusing on usability and consistency.
Supported front-end integration with backend services by optimizing component structure and styling logic.
Contributed to the redesign of internal administrative modules, enhancing their functionality and ease of use.
Worked alongside senior developers, applying best practices and learning advanced frontend techniques in a real-world environment.
Gained hands-on experience in front-end development, setting the foundation for future full-stack work.

projects.title: Calidad SEMS - (Project for a statewide high school network)
projects.description: A web application in which we the system administrators, teachers, students, academic and administrative staff of the UDG high school network can perform automated school related tasks. https://calidad.sems.udg.mx/Creditos

projects.title: Explore the Universe - Interactive Web Application
projects.description: Explore the Universe is an interactive web application powered by NASA APIs that allows users to discover space through real scientific data. It features the Astronomy Picture of the Day with detailed explanations, a search function connected to the NASA Image and Video Library for exploring photos and videos, and a fully interactive 3D model of the solar system built with Three.js. Users can navigate through celestial bodies, view them up close, and access relevant information, making the experience both educational and visually engaging.

projects.title: Kanban Boards App - Deployed
projects.description: A full-stack Kanban board application that allows users to register, authenticate using JWT-secured login, and manage tasks efficiently. Users can create multiple boards and add tasks with dynamic status updates using drag-and-drop functionality. Tasks can be moved between Pending, In Progress, and Complete columns, visually reflecting their progress. Each task can also include multiple subtasks, displayed in a post-it style for easy tracking and organization.

projects.title: Ticket System
projects.description: Web application that allows users to create and manage reports for the administration team. Users can submit requests or report errors, including details such as descriptive text and attachments. Each ticket is displayed in a chat-like format, facilitating two-way communication between the user and administration. Through this channel, administration can leave comments or request more information, and the user can respond, allowing for smooth follow-up until the case is resolved.

projects.title: Cryptocurrency Exchange Rate App
projects.description: Application to calculate the exchange rate of currencies to cryptocurrencies to practice what I've learned in a javascript course.
